author: bago
msg: Re-enabled code previously disabled per javamail bugs and added few tests.
They seem to pass and 1.4.1ea works fine! (JAMES-52, JAMES-410)
Changed RemoteDelivery to support <mail.xxx.xxx> configurations: they are copied to the Properties used to create a new session.
